title: I feel like Nexus Blitz is gonna cause the same thing as URF
body:
I played like 20 games one the day it was released and only ~5 in the two days since then. Haven't touched SR since Tuesday even though I was planning on finishing the placements on my main this week.

Maybe make this 2 nights a week or something? At least on OCE...

replies.body: i was going to quit but Nexus blitz made me forget how much I hate the meta, and now I'm preparing to try in ranked again.
Nah im already bored of it and im sure any other player who plays majority ranked games will get bored of it too

Twisted treeline is already only available at certain times, so ranked in that on OCE is impossible to do, levelling a new champ unlocks countless game modes that aren't available on OCE already, and Blitz is the only gamemode that brings back long gone items, so myself and others are spamming it for the old school broken builds.

Don't ruin it for people like us because you don't want to play it. Don't want to play it? Don't, just don't ruin it for the rest of us.
Pretty sure Riot won't act on what someone says on the boards. They will do what they need to in regards to queue times and popularity of the game types.
